channel.title: Npc dialogue help PLEASE
channel.description:
im stuck on how to make it so when u clcik on a npc that says talk to. A dialogue things appears and you like speak to him. Its like the ones were u talk to them and they ask how r you and you reply with fine thanks.
i tried izzy's tut on rl but it didnt work for some reason
haha sorry for sounding like a noob but this will prob be last thing i need help with (hopefully)
so can any 1 help me out or send me to a tut please :)
thanks alot
